dc:title: A.J.: Death of a Peacemaker
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An obituary and biography of Abraham Johannes Muste highlighting his peaceful nature and involvement in the labor and peace protests. Comments briefly on his encounter with P. Maurin.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 133 1967-03-24 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
